measured_by: Sensitivity parameter σ in the logistic choice function
justification: “σ is a sensitivity parameter, which ranges from 0 to 1, [and] determines randomness in participants’ choices.”

measured_by: Decay parameter λ in the value accumulation model
justification: “The parameter λ, which ranges from 0 to 1, applies temporal decay… by reducing the impact of earlier outcomes on the total sum.”
